tags: me: knows harry has green eyes
also me: his eyes are so green WOW
caption: 🌿🌱🍃🌳💚

body:
Harry Styles Self Titled Series

Ava worked with harry in the bakery. They lose contact and things become sour once Ava is hired as Harry’s producer for his self titled album seven years later.

Warnings❗️none really

Part 1

Part 2

Part 3

Part 4. Meet Me In the Hallway

You called sick for the week not wanting to confront Harry after admitting to being in love with him. It was all too much. And not that it was a total lie either, you did feel sick. Of seeing Harry. When you finally showed your face on Monday it was found that official records of two of the songs where complete, you just had to approve and they would be 100% ready. You wrote them off then set yourself to every other task you had to do that didn’t involve Harry. On the occasion you would hear him or see him coming you would go to another room. You knew you couldn’t avoid him forever in this situation but it was a temporary fix. (Badum tshhh). The next level was keeping talking to a minimum with him, only addressing important work and any other messages you left with Mark (the second producer). It was about two weeks into this new routine that Harry had another sample. After arguing with Pip for hours it was demanded that you stay for the recording and producing. ‘It’s your job Ava, since when do you not want to be all hands on with his kind of stuff, you love it. I just don’t understand.’ Pip shakes her head at you.

I flop onto her sofa and huff. ‘I do love it, but just not with him.’

‘What is it about him? There’s something you’re not telling me. I can tell, have you had a past relationship with him? Because he sure seemed to remember you that first day.’ She crosses her arms across her chest. You couldn’t not address the elephant in the room this time. You sigh in defeat. ‘Look, we worked together a few years ago before he was famous. I guess we had some kind of you could say one sided relationship issues and I never thought I’d have to see him again but here we are.’ She cocks her head to the side in thought.

‘What do you mean one sided relationship issues?’

‘God. Like, I’m in love with someone who doesn’t love me back and it hurt when they left me.’ You say exasperated.

‘You love him?’

‘I didn’t say that. I said I loved him. Past tense.’ You correct.

She laughs putting her hands on her hips. ‘No Ava, you said love. I think you still have some kind of relationship issues.’

You scrunch your nose. ‘We aren’t in a relationship how can we have issues.’

‘You’re in a work relationship.’ She states.

To your dismay you do end up being put into work with him again with recording. It’s early Tuesday morning and you have a coffee in hand headset on and grumpy as hell. Not in the mood for Pip’s breezy floating mood. You get her out of the studio just to have one less thing on your mind. You adjust knobs and buttons on the recording desk than signal to Harry to begin.

‘Cause you left me in the hallway.’

Yeah that hit close to home. You feel sick but not because you’re sick. You had left him in the hallway, and now it was another line in another one of his songs. He had sung the whole song locking eyes with you the whole time and you’d never felt more vulnerable than that moment. This sucked. Harry wasn’t as warm to you either these past few weeks, you were both upset and hurt. But you pushed on with your façade and so did he. Suddenly the door flung open and in walked some new guy you’d never seen at the office before. He must have been in his twenties too and he made your stomach do a flip.

He smiled. ‘Hi I’m Alfie, I’m new and I am the recording engineer.’

‘Oh.’ You squeak and you feel your face go red. ‘Oh, I mean. Yes. Hi. I’m Ava, Ava Bentley. I’m the producer. I guess you’re our recording engineer I haven’t met you.’

‘British?’ He acknowledges your accent.

‘Oh, yes. Redditch.’

‘It’s cute.’ He smiles at you.

You blush, and tuck a lose strand of hair behind your ear. ‘Thank you. Okay well I guess we should run over a couple other songs then. Harry?’ You look at Harry, who looks like he’s tasted something sour. ‘Sure thing love.’ He nods at Alfie. ‘We’ve met.’ His says, his voice turning back to melted honey. You look back at Alfie and bite your lip. Maybe you could deal with Harry, now that you had a ‘distraction.’ You’re surprised how easy it is to talk to Alfie, both with your extensive knowledge and passion for music. And you find yourself being more productive. The day went too quickly and you hadn’t even thought of Harry, which was a first. ‘Hey, you know we should like meet up some time for drinks or something, I’d love to get to know you more seeing as we’ll be working together.’ Alfie says as you lock up the studio. You turn to face him and the wind whips your hair in your face. You brush it away and grin. ‘Yeah that would be nice.’

The following week Alfie calls you and you instantly pick up. Different to if Harry had called. ‘Hello, Ava speaking.’ You twist your hair, feelings like a teenage girl. ‘Hi, so there’s this event tomorrow night, it’s in town and it’s like pretty cool, there’s going to be artists and producers and lots of cool people into music and I got invited with a plus one, if you’d like to join.’ He speaks through the phone. You smile even though he can’t see you. ‘I’d love to join you.’

‘Great well, I guess I’ll see you tomorrow night. I’ll send you the details.’

Picking out an outfit was the most fun you’d had in a long time. You decided on a spaghetti strap black dress and heels to match. You liked the sultry dark look, it went well with your eyes. After weeks of hibernation, the red lip came back. You’d decided that you did like it and that you were over Harry and his stupid song. You heard a light tap on your door and you flung it open and did jazz hands to show yourself off. ‘Wow. Ava you look amazing.’ Alfie says taken aback. ‘Thank you. You should see yourself.’ You giggle. He lifts his arm for you to take and you do, letting him take you to the Uber out the front. So many people that you had heard of but never met where at this event and the celebrities did your head in. You couldn’t believe you where in a room with so many talented people, the possibilities were endless. Many of them performed. But the one person who you’d spotted in the crowd that made your head spin was Harry. He was every where. Sure he noticed you and sure his eyes where on you a bit longer than necessary but who cares. You looked good and you knew it. Alfie came back over to you with another drink. Alfie bent down to talk in your ear so he could be heard over the music. ‘How would you like to dance.’ He said running his fingers down your arms causing a shiver to run down your spine. You wondered if Harry’s hands would feel the same. But you pushed that thought to the back of your mind. You glanced to the side where you had seen Harry and saw him standing there in the corner, watching you. You realized that you didn’t really like Alfie, he was after all a distraction, and you felt bad using him to get on Harry’s nerves. But Alfie didn’t have to know that. You turned to talk in Alfie’s ear your lips brushing against his skin. ‘I’d love to dance.’

summary: Sophia Lastor (Hailee Steinfeld) is requesting their betrothed; that’s around the age of 20-30, a royal and looks like Harry...
caption:
Sophia Lastor (Hailee Steinfeld) is requesting their betrothed; that’s around the age of 20-30, a royal and looks like Harry Styles, Chace Crawford, Dacre Montgomery, Michael B. Jordan or any fc. Read more about it on our wanted connections page.

When pirates threaten your existence, how far would you go to fight for what you believe? For those you care about? Monarchs take harsh measures to contain the advance of piracy. But the measure backfires. Now, royal families watch the gruesome consequences of the actions, drowning nations in panic. Who could be the next heir to disappear?

  An appless royals/pirates pairs smut rp (a little bit of everything)

title: Let You Go (Royal Series) Update
body:
Hey everyone!

I was in the middle of writing part two to Let You Go when I was listening to Shawn Mendes’ new album and one of the songs Because I Had You completely inspired me! So I’ve decided to extend the series further than I originally planned. The part two I was working on will now become part three and the new part two will be based off/inspired by Because I Had You.

This means I will take a bit longer to write than originally planned but I hope it will be worth it! Prepare for angst xx

Read part one, Let You Go, here

Also I just found this gif and imagine that’s Harry seeing you in the crowd wow

body:
Harry Styles Self Titled Series

Ava worked with harry in the bakery. They lose contact and things become sour once Ava is hired as Harry’s producer for his self titled album seven years later.

Warings❗️swearing

Part 1

Part 2

PART 3. From The Dining Table

The next few weeks you removed yourself from all the recording days choosing to only listen to them on your own and evaluate then discuss your opinion with Harry and Pip on meeting days. It was time for you to listen to another song, others had been written and put out into draft song form such as Carolina and Only Angel which you secretly digged (because they weren’t about you). However I guess it was short lived because harry wasn’t the best at subtly, lord he didn’t even try it. You placed the headphone over your ears and the first few notes played, along came his warm voice. You closed your eyes. You hated how vulnerable his music made you feel, especially the one he wrote about you. This song was the exact same. But it also made you angry, you felt like harry was blaming you for everything when he was the one who stopped calling. It wasn’t even like you were lovers or anything. Why was he writing so emotionally about you? I guess it’s inspiring to think of it as lovers. You had loved him and that’s probably why it hurt so much when he left. Goddamit, you sat in silence after listening to the song pondering the meaning over and over in your head. The sound of someone coughing startled you out of your thoughts. You pushed the headphones off you head and turned to find Harry leaning in the doorway. ‘So what do you think?’

He queried. You stared at him silently.

He frowned pushing away from the doorframe. ‘I’m not a monster, you can talk to me love.’ He smiles that damn crooked smile.

‘Stop.’ You say.

He stops.

‘No.’ You shake your head. ‘It’s not fair.’ You look at him and blink back tears.

‘You can’t blame it on me.’ You stand up to face him, but being a measly 5’5 and him 5’11 he stood over you.

‘Don’t you dare say I didn’t call you because I did, Harry. Everyday. You’re the one who never answered or retuned them.’

He didn’t answer.

‘Whatever or whoever you’re writing from.’ You jab his chest with your finger. ‘You need something new to motivate you.’ You turn away so he doesn’t see the tear spill from you eye. You wipe it away with the back of your hand.

‘I didn’t know.’ Harry spoke up. You turn around to face him again your blood boiling.

‘How the fuck would you not know. It was your own phone!’ You spit at him and he flinches, not accustomed to this new found anger.

‘I never got any voice mails. And when I tried calling you someone else answered, you changed your number?’ He started to get angry too. You stumble back confused.

‘What? I never changed my number, not for another five years at least.’

His face flicks from confusion back to anger before settling with confusion.

‘Well I dont know what happened but I wasn’t avoiding you.’ He said calmly breathing in and out and unclenching his jaw. You just stare at him. Again you feel tears prick your eyes. No. Not again.

‘I’ll see you on Wednesday.’ You mutter before grabbing your bag and heading out the door. ‘Wait.’ He calls. You stop but don’t turn. He walks around to you and hands you the usb with the demo. ‘You might want this.’ You look ahead as he places the usb in your hand. His fingers cold on your skin. Making goosebumps appear from the contact. He walks back down the hall leaving you. You don’t listen to the song again just let it sit on your counter top staring at you. You get tempted by it so many times but don’t let it win. It’s just a stupid song. On Sunday Harry calls you, you almost don’t answer but put your ego to the side. Work comes first. ‘Hello, Ava Bentley speaking how can I help.’ You say over cheerfully.

‘Ava, uhhh hi, it’s Harry. Are you around?’

You tense up. ‘Yes I am.’ You say hesitantly, you must admit you had considered lying.

‘Good, do you think you could come meet me at my studio, I actually added something more to the demo from last week I think you might like it.’ He pushes

You glance at the clock on the wall and then at the usb sitting on your countertop. You sigh. ‘Sure I’ll be right over. You uh have to send me the address however I’m not familiar.’

‘No problem see you soon.’ Then dead air. You run upstairs and apply some makeup, pink lipstick has been traded for the red. You put your hair up in a ponytail with loose ends sticking out. Why you were concerned about how you looked around Harry bothered you more than it should. Even your clothing you took more time than usual. You had to steady your breathing on the way over, you hated the idea of being with Harry one on one for the first time in seven years. Sure you saw him a couple days ago but it was at work and you weren’t completely alone. This was different, it was at his apartment. You knocked at his door and in 24 seconds it was flung open. ‘Hi’ he grinned at you.

‘Hi.’ You return.

‘Come in Come in.’ He stands aside to let you in. His apartment is too nice and you feel like a cheapskate in it, so out of place.

Rubbing your arms you turn full 360 to face him. ‘So what is it you wanted to show me.’ You shrug out of your coat which he takes and hangs up for you. He scratches the back of his neck before looking at you. ‘Well, Uh it’s not actually work related I just knew it was the only thing to get you to come over.’ He says sheepishly.

You dropped your arms and look away

‘We aren’t friends Harry, I’m talking to you strictly for work purposes.’

He moves to your side touching your arm but you pull away.

‘Ava. Come just look.’ His excitement returns. You can’t help but feel a little bit curious.

‘Fine.’ You say

He guides you along the hallway to the dining room. He moves swiftly picking up a plate from the table and making his way back to you. He holds it up.

‘Oh my god.’ You laugh staring at the dish. It was two choc chip cookies with finger bun frosting in the middle to make a sandwich.

‘Wow I haven’t had one of these for years. God how do you even remember that?’ You take the plate from him. He plays with the strings on his hoodie.

‘I make them every now and then, I mean how could I forget they were the highlight of our job bake at that bakery, apart from Mrs Miller..’

‘You remember Mrs Miller!’ You scoff.

Harry looks back up at you with a cheeky grin. ‘You two bakery girls.’ He imitates an old lady voice. You laugh and he can’t help but laugh with you. You sigh and place the plate with the diabetes on the table. ‘I didn’t come here to eat cake and talk about old times. I mean it’s been nice but I don’t know what you want.’ He looks pained as he thinks. ‘I want things to go back to the way they were. I want to be friends again.’ He puts forward slowly.

‘Harry.’ You falter. ‘I don’t think I can do that.’ His face falls and it pains you.

‘Why not?’ His green eyes search your blue ones. You look away and walk back out to the hallway, he follows you.

‘Because.’ You lock your eyes with his again. ‘Because I loved you Harry, the sixteen year old girl I was. And when you left, you broke my heart. And I have spent years rebuilding it, and I’m not willing to let you back in and tear it down again.’ Hot tears started to fall down your face. He touches your hand but this just causes you to loose it even more. ‘No.’ You cry but it gets caught in your throat. You grab your coat from the hallway coat hanger.

‘I have to leave.’ And he lets you.


Part 4

You had to steady your breathing on the way over, you hated the idea of being with Harry one on one for the first time in seven years. Sure you saw him a couple days ago but it was at work and you weren’t completely alone. This was different, it was at his apartment. You knocked at his door and in 24 seconds it was flung open. ‘Hi’ he grinned at you.

‘Hi.’ You return.

‘Come in Come in.’ He stands aside to let you in. His apartment is too nice and you feel like a cheapskate in it, so out of place.

Rubbing your arms you turn full 360 to face him. ‘So what is it you wanted to show me.’ You shrug out of your coat which he takes and hangs up for you. He scratches the back of his neck before looking at you. ‘Well, Uh it’s not actually work related I just knew it was the only thing to get you to come over.’ He says sheepishly.

You dropped your arms and look away

‘We aren’t friends Harry, I’m talking to you strictly for work purposes.’

He moves to your side touching your arm but you pull away.

‘Ava. Come just look.’ His excitement returns. You can’t help but feel a little bit curious.

‘Fine.’ You say

He guides you along the hallway to the dining room. He moves swiftly picking up a plate from the table and making his way back to you. He holds it up.

‘Oh my god.’ You laugh staring at the dish. It was two choc chip cookies with finger bun frosting in the middle to make a sandwich.

‘Wow I haven’t had one of these for years. God how do you even remember that?’ You take the plate from him. He plays with the strings on his hoodie.

‘I make them every now and then, I mean how could I forget they were the highlight of our job bake at that bakery, apart from Mrs Miller..’

‘You remember Mrs Miller!’ You scoff.

Harry looks back up at you with a cheeky grin. ‘You two bakery girls.’ He imitates an old lady voice. You laugh and he can’t help but laugh with you. You sigh and place the plate with the diabetes on the table. ‘I didn’t come here to eat cake and talk about old times. I mean it’s been nice but I don’t know what you want.’ He looks pained as he thinks. ‘I want things to go back to the way they were. I want to be friends again.’ He puts forward slowly.

‘Harry.’ You falter. ‘I don’t think I can do that.’ His face falls and it pains you.

‘Why not?’ His green eyes search your blue ones. You look away and walk back out to the hallway, he follows you.

‘Because.’ You lock your eyes with his again. ‘Because I loved you Harry, the sixteen year old girl I was. And when you left, you broke my heart. And I have spent years rebuilding it, and I’m not willing to let you back in and tear it down again.’ Hot tears started to fall down your face. He touches your hand but this just causes you to loose it even more. ‘No.’ You cry but it gets caught in your throat. You grab your coat from the hallway coat hanger.

‘I have to leave.’ And he lets you.


Part 4
trail.content:
Harry Styles Self Titled Series

Ava worked with harry in the bakery. They lose contact and things become sour once Ava is hired as Harry’s producer for his self titled album seven years later.

Warings❗️swearing

Part 1

Part 2

PART 3. From The Dining Table

The next few weeks you removed yourself from all the recording days choosing to only listen to them on your own and evaluate then discuss your opinion with Harry and Pip on meeting days. It was time for you to listen to another song, others had been written and put out into draft song form such as Carolina and Only Angel which you secretly digged (because they weren’t about you). However I guess it was short lived because harry wasn’t the best at subtly, lord he didn’t even try it. You placed the headphone over your ears and the first few notes played, along came his warm voice. You closed your eyes. You hated how vulnerable his music made you feel, especially the one he wrote about you. This song was the exact same. But it also made you angry, you felt like harry was blaming you for everything when he was the one who stopped calling. It wasn’t even like you were lovers or anything. Why was he writing so emotionally about you? I guess it’s inspiring to think of it as lovers. You had loved him and that’s probably why it hurt so much when he left. Goddamit, you sat in silence after listening to the song pondering the meaning over and over in your head. The sound of someone coughing startled you out of your thoughts. You pushed the headphones off you head and turned to find Harry leaning in the doorway. ‘So what do you think?’

He queried. You stared at him silently.

He frowned pushing away from the doorframe. ‘I’m not a monster, you can talk to me love.’ He smiles that damn crooked smile.

‘Stop.’ You say.

He stops.

‘No.’ You shake your head. ‘It’s not fair.’ You look at him and blink back tears.

‘You can’t blame it on me.’ You stand up to face him, but being a measly 5’5 and him 5’11 he stood over you.

‘Don’t you dare say I didn’t call you because I did, Harry. Everyday. You’re the one who never answered or retuned them.’

He didn’t answer.

‘Whatever or whoever you’re writing from.’ You jab his chest with your finger. ‘You need something new to motivate you.’ You turn away so he doesn’t see the tear spill from you eye. You wipe it away with the back of your hand.

‘I didn’t know.’ Harry spoke up. You turn around to face him again your blood boiling.

‘How the fuck would you not know. It was your own phone!’ You spit at him and he flinches, not accustomed to this new found anger.

‘I never got any voice mails. And when I tried calling you someone else answered, you changed your number?’ He started to get angry too. You stumble back confused.

‘What? I never changed my number, not for another five years at least.’

His face flicks from confusion back to anger before settling with confusion.

‘Well I dont know what happened but I wasn’t avoiding you.’ He said calmly breathing in and out and unclenching his jaw. You just stare at him. Again you feel tears prick your eyes. No. Not again.

‘I’ll see you on Wednesday.’ You mutter before grabbing your bag and heading out the door. ‘Wait.’ He calls. You stop but don’t turn. He walks around to you and hands you the usb with the demo. ‘You might want this.’ You look ahead as he places the usb in your hand. His fingers cold on your skin. Making goosebumps appear from the contact. He walks back down the hall leaving you. You don’t listen to the song again just let it sit on your counter top staring at you. You get tempted by it so many times but don’t let it win. It’s just a stupid song. On Sunday Harry calls you, you almost don’t answer but put your ego to the side. Work comes first. ‘Hello, Ava Bentley speaking how can I help.’ You say over cheerfully.

‘Ava, uhhh hi, it’s Harry. Are you around?’

You tense up. ‘Yes I am.’ You say hesitantly, you must admit you had considered lying.

‘Good, do you think you could come meet me at my studio, I actually added something more to the demo from last week I think you might like it.’ He pushes

You glance at the clock on the wall and then at the usb sitting on your countertop. You sigh. ‘Sure I’ll be right over. You uh have to send me the address however I’m not familiar.’

‘No problem see you soon.’ Then dead air. You run upstairs and apply some makeup, pink lipstick has been traded for the red. You put your hair up in a ponytail with loose ends sticking out. Why you were concerned about how you looked around Harry bothered you more than it should. Even your clothing you took more time than usual. You had to steady your breathing on the way over, you hated the idea of being with Harry one on one for the first time in seven years. Sure you saw him a couple days ago but it was at work and you weren’t completely alone. This was different, it was at his apartment. You knocked at his door and in 24 seconds it was flung open. ‘Hi’ he grinned at you.

‘Hi.’ You return.

‘Come in Come in.’ He stands aside to let you in. His apartment is too nice and you feel like a cheapskate in it, so out of place.

Rubbing your arms you turn full 360 to face him. ‘So what is it you wanted to show me.’ You shrug out of your coat which he takes and hangs up for you. He scratches the back of his neck before looking at you. ‘Well, Uh it’s not actually work related I just knew it was the only thing to get you to come over.’ He says sheepishly.

You dropped your arms and look away

‘We aren’t friends Harry, I’m talking to you strictly for work purposes.’

He moves to your side touching your arm but you pull away.

‘Ava. Come just look.’ His excitement returns. You can’t help but feel a little bit curious.

‘Fine.’ You say

He guides you along the hallway to the dining room. He moves swiftly picking up a plate from the table and making his way back to you. He holds it up.

‘Oh my god.’ You laugh staring at the dish. It was two choc chip cookies with finger bun frosting in the middle to make a sandwich.

‘Wow I haven’t had one of these for years. God how do you even remember that?’ You take the plate from him. He plays with the strings on his hoodie.

‘I make them every now and then, I mean how could I forget they were the highlight of our job bake at that bakery, apart from Mrs Miller..’

‘You remember Mrs Miller!’ You scoff.

Harry looks back up at you with a cheeky grin. ‘You two bakery girls.’ He imitates an old lady voice. You laugh and he can’t help but laugh with you. You sigh and place the plate with the diabetes on the table. ‘I didn’t come here to eat cake and talk about old times. I mean it’s been nice but I don’t know what you want.’ He looks pained as he thinks. ‘I want things to go back to the way they were. I want to be friends again.’ He puts forward slowly.

‘Harry.’ You falter. ‘I don’t think I can do that.’ His face falls and it pains you.

‘Why not?’ His green eyes search your blue ones. You look away and walk back out to the hallway, he follows you.

‘Because.’ You lock your eyes with his again. ‘Because I loved you Harry, the sixteen year old girl I was. And when you left, you broke my heart. And I have spent years rebuilding it, and I’m not willing to let you back in and tear it down again.’ Hot tears started to fall down your face. He touches your hand but this just causes you to loose it even more. ‘No.’ You cry but it gets caught in your throat. You grab your coat from the hallway coat hanger.

‘I have to leave.’ And he lets you.


Part 4

blog.description:
If Harry jumps off the bridge, so do I.

Sorry mom.

All for you and me

My writings

summary: I need some dom Harry angst rn.Like not even smut or anything,just imagine him getting all dominant during a fight omg
question: I need some dom Harry angst rn.Like not even smut or anything,just imagine him getting all dominant during a fight omg
answer:
Ugh. His face is red from the shouting, veins popping up in his neck. He’s all angry because what happened a few minutes ago, one of his was flirting with her. Not to mention that she, however, was trying her best to push him away he was still accusing of something that she will never do.

“Go fuck yourself harry! You’re such an asshole right now!!! Not even thinking straight!” She spats out of disgust and the thing she knows, he has her under his grip pinned to the wall forcefully. He grips her hand tightly against above her head, his hot minty breath with a mix of whiskey that he consumed in anger fanning her face.

His green eyes turned completely dark now as he leans his face closer to hers holding her jaw with one hand.

“You’re fucking mine! Only mine.” He growls squeezing her cheeks and connecting her lips to his in a forceful kiss. Let’s just say he made sure she’s got his name painted over skin that’ll be prominent till few days, with his back covered in her nail scratches that night. Need to tell his friend whom she really belongs too.

_

FEELS ALL OVER THE PLACE RN. Talk to me here
